subsubsection.title: SKILLS
subsubsection.p:
Practice each skill in the exercises listed.
Solve a system by substitution: 14
Solve a system by elimination: 58
Choose a method and solve the system: 918, 2932
Solve problems by writing and solving a system: 1928
